title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 6.8 - Equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 6.8 - Equipment

State Regulations
A tester shall test only with equipment that accurately
determines or aids in the accurate determination of the amount of a component. Equipment shall meet the specifications and be in compliance with the
applicable provisions of Standard Methods and/or approved by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
6.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
